snippet: With its Real Directions feature, some Garmin GPS units now give directions using landmarks, saying, for example, to turn left at the Starbucks.
abstract: Real Directions feature available on six of Garmin's GPS devices gives spoken driving directions based on landmarks rather than street names.
lead_paragraph: With its Real Directions feature, some Garmin GPS units now give directions using landmarks, saying, for example, to turn left at the Starbucks.

headline.seo: Navigating With Devices That Know Landmarks
headline.main: Navigating With Devices That Know Landmarks
headline.print_headline: Navigating With Devices That Know Landmarks
